value:
Hi, it me, you know, Andres, but just call me Tuti, that gonna be easier for both. Now just let me introduce myself, I am 23 years old and I am studying at UTN in San Francisco, Córdoba, Argentina. 
 I am in the last steps before graduate, I am interested in videogames, movies, photography and music (specially post-punk).

Well, I worked on a project doing the Login and making the backend with ASPNET, and I used the EntityFramework with an SQL database.
 Also I Know JavaScript, If you take a look in my GitHub repos, you can see in DSTP1 (Sorry for that strange name, this is the abbreviation of subject and project), I used APIs and also I know how to use the DOM. Right now I am learning about React, this portfolio was remaked with this Technology.
My objetives in a short term is work for get some expirience and learn new technologies (mainly FrontEnd but I am also open to learn BackEnd).

think the most important of that kind of CV or portfolio is talk about my skills, if you are a recruiter I think is kinda obvious I know HTML, CSS and Tailwind, but there are some projects on C# and dotnet where I used it as an API and also using and MVC architecture with ASPNET.
A VERY FORMAL AND TOO SERIOUS LETTER
Please write the subject before sent the letter.
Please write the message before sent the letter.
Please write the subject and message before sent the letter.
